snippet: “Brooklyn Abolitionists/In Pursuit of Freedom,” at the Brooklyn Historical Society, spotlights extraordinary figures in the history of slavery and abolition in New York, and James W. C. Pennington, a preacher and abolitionist.
abstract: Edward Rothstein reviews exhibit Brooklyn Abolitionists/In Pursuit of Freedom, exploring extraordinary figures in history of slavery and abolition, at Brooklyn Historical Society.
lead_paragraph: “Brooklyn Abolitionists/In Pursuit of Freedom,” at the Brooklyn Historical Society, spotlights extraordinary figures in the history of slavery and abolition in New York, and James W. C. Pennington, a preacher and abolitionist.
